trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> non sarà generato in alcuni casi, ad esempio quando la stessa parte di contenuto si accede o quando ci si sposta da un frammento di contenuto sul contenuto che è attualmente caricato (ovvero, il valore del <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> proprietà).

trans-unit.source: When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Durante la navigazione in una risorsa XAML compilata finale <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> evento non può essere generato.

trans-unit.source: This means that at the end of the download, the last reported <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> value may not equal the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che al termine del download, l'ultimo segnalato <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> valore potrebbe non essere uguali di <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event to be notified when the navigation has finished.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> eventi per ricevere una notifica quando la navigazione è terminata.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come gestire <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene chiamato il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" />, o quando viene richiesta una nuova navigazione mentre è già in corso una navigazione.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Gestire <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> se è necessario individuare informazioni pertinenti sulla richiesta di spostamento durante il download viene interrotto.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event handler, and includes:
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono disponibili dal <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> oggetto passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> gestore eventi e include:

trans-unit.source: The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] richiesto.

trans-unit.source: The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: Lo strumento di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Dati aggiuntivi, se la navigazione è stata avviata chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come gestire <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: Ricarica il contenuto corrente.

trans-unit.source: If the current content (specified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> property) is navigated to again, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not download the content again.
trans-unit.target: Se il contenuto corrente (specificato dal valore della <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> proprietà) si accede nuovamente, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> non scarica nuovamente il contenuto.

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to re-navigate to the content, call <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per forzare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> per spostarsi di nuovo il contenuto, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, a new entry is not added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che se il contenuto corrente si accede nuovamente chiamando se <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, non viene aggiunta una nuova voce alla cronologia di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la voce più recente del journal dalla cronologia indietro.

trans-unit.source: The most recent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> più recente nella eventuale cronologia di navigazione indietro.

trans-unit.source: If two or more navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.
trans-unit.target: Se due o più strumenti di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) condividono la stessa cronologia di navigazione, uno di essi è possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> per recuperare la voce di cronologia di navigazione all'indietro per un'operazione di navigazione che ha avuto luogo in un altro strumento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenuto corrente, o lo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del nuovo contenuto nuovo sul quale ci si sta spostando.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> contenente lo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per il contenuto corrente o per il contenuto sul quale ci si sta spostando.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navigates to the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta questa proprietà su un altro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] rispetto a quello attualmente visualizzato, lo strumento di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) consente di passare all'oggetto specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> is set to the content that is loaded from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> è impostato per il contenuto da cui viene caricato il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] che si accede, a meno che non lo spostamento viene annullato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], and can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> può essere impostata con un solo frammento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]e può essere impostato su `null`.

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe il download di contenuto per la richiesta di navigazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> can be called as soon as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> può essere chiamato non appena <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> restituisce e verrà arrestata la navigazione è in corso nel frame figlio.

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata di <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> metodo genera il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> deve essere chiamato sullo stesso thread che ha avviato la navigazione.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to stop loading.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come interrompere il caricamento.
